explanation: The line dp[i][0] = max(dp[i-2]) + xl[i] + yl[j] used yl[j], but j is the loop variable from the previous inner loop (or may be undefined for some i). That causes an incorrect/out-of-scope index. The intention is to use the y-value for index 0 when setting dp[i][0]. I replaced yl[j] with yl[0].
